Hehehe” Futaba laughed before selecting Akira’s name before selecting Ann’s name. ’Sorry Ann. I just need to prove something to Akira.’ she thought. She looked up at Akira, who simply stated “why am I here, again, Futaba?” Futaba ignored him before looking back at her phone. She had received a text from Ann, or rather, Akira in Ann’s body. It simply stated ‘What did you do? Why am I in Ann’s body? Does this mean the app is real?’

“Well that text is going bye-bye” She whispered, not used to having Ann’s voice. She pressed delete on the text and then proceeded to undo the possession.

She was then back in LeBlanc, with Akira’s hand waving in her face. “Futaba, what’s wrong with you? How did you forget why you called me here?”
“Huh?” was all that she could say as she pushed Akira’s hand out of the way. “I’m back.”

She quickly messaged Ann, asking her if she wanted to meet up somewhere. To her delight, Ann agreed.

Futaba met up with Ann in Inokashira Park. The smell of fresh air drifted around her nose, an unfamiliar yet not unwelcome aroma. Ann saw Futaba before smiling and waving at her. Futaba quickly jogged towards Ann, her mind focused on how she was going to word her apology.

“Hey Futaba!” Ann’s cheery voice cut through her thoughts like a knife, snapping her out of her focus.
“Oh, hi Ann.” Futaba responded.
“So what did you want to show me?”
“This App.” Futaba whipped out her phone and showed her the app.
“What does the app do? Just looks like a bunch of names to me.”
“It allows you to possess people, like a ghost.”
“Ok, Futaba. That’s a little far fetched, even for you.” Ann replied, baffled by her explanation.
“I’ll prove it, then. Who would you like to possess, then? It would only be for a very short while.”
Ann was taken aback by this question.

After a while of thinking, she responded “For a second, I’ll assume the app will work. Prove it by having me possess Makoto for a bit. She’ll probably be studying right now so it won’t appear too strange for her.”

Futaba then selected Ann’s name from the list, followed by Makoto. In an instant, Ann’s demeanour changed. “So Futaba, what do you want to do?” Ann acted as if the previous conversation never happened, which is exactly what should have happened. Futaba then pressed the undo button after around 20 seconds. ‘That should be long enough, right?’ she thought.

Ann’s demeanour changed yet again. “Wow Futaba,you weren’t lying!” She stated, shocked.
“I told you so.” Futaba replied smugly.
“Why did you decide to tell me about the app, though?”
“Well....uh..” This was the moment she was dreading. “I decided to tell you as an apology. You see.....You were the one I possessed when I discovered what the app does..I’m sorry.”

Ann stood there, speechless. Eventually, she composed herself and said “Don’t sweat it. I’m glad you told me, though, Futaba. Now we can have some fun with it.” Futaba gave a sigh of relief. She was happy that Ann wasn’t mad at her, and now she had an accomplice. “Do you have any idea of what you want to do with the app, then?” She asked Ann.

Ann said “We could either possess 2 of the other members of the phantom thieves. Maybe we could try possessing some of the boys? Besides," she added, "if you possess one of the boys, you'll have the chance to do almost whatever you want to do to prank them; within reason and if you want to, of course."

[SAKAMOTO RYUJI | ]
